title: New: Working Girls – Your Voice
content:
Having been keeping an ear out for Louisville outfit Working Girls for a while now, the release of his most recent track, Your Voice, finally pushed into deciding that he’s more than worthy of featuring on these pages.

A dark lament to a dominating lover, the synths are atramentous and foreboding, whereas the vocals are misty and overcast, yet allow the track to breathe and  develop a personality that it would otherwise be lacking. Check out Your Voice below, and keep up with Working Girls via Facebook.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
